name: clickhouse-mcp
description: Access ClickHouse's powerful analytics database through MCP. Query data, manage databases, and get help with ClickHouse SQL instantly.

metadata.short_description: Access ClickHouse's powerful analytics database through MCP
metadata.mesh_description: ClickHouse MCP provides intelligent access to ClickHouse, the fast open-source columnar database management system for online analytical processing (OLAP). This official MCP enables AI agents to interact with ClickHouse databases, run SQL queries, explore schemas, and get help with ClickHouse-specific SQL syntax. Perfect for real-time analytics, log analysis, time-series data, and business intelligence workloads. ClickHouse is known for its exceptional query performance, efficient compression, and ability to process billions of rows in seconds. The MCP helps developers and analysts leverage ClickHouse's full potential for data exploration, reporting, and building data-driven applications.
